entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
